author: Paul van Mulbregt
title: Do not set the arcsine._support_mask to _open_support_mask. The arcsine distribution is theoretically the same as the beta(0.5, 0.5) distribution,  but the arcsine code was restricting itself to the interior points of the interval [0, 1] and the _pdf() method was returning values different from scipy.stats.beta(0.5, 0.5)._pdf(). By not setting arcsine._support_mask, the endpoints are no-longer special-cased and the _pdf()s for the two distributions agree at the endpoints. Updated the testing so that arcsine is no longer tested in test_support(). See #7421.
